A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A bastardization of Star Wars\, infused with misguided and generally incorrect political sentiments that are more a product of the times that we live in\, than something that is characteristic of the general narrative scope of Star Wars: the continual struggle between good and evil\, and the balance of light and dark.\n\nFurther\, without spoiling anything\, it utterly defiles the canon and derails the trilogy. It is all flash and no substance. Yet\, the damage is done.
